title: Centrais Elétricas Brasileiras S.A. - Eletrobrás (EBR) Q2 2025 Earnings Call Transcript
description: Centrais Elétricas Brasileiras S.A. - Eletrobrás (NYSE:EBR) Q2 2025 Earnings Conference Call August 7, 2025 11:00 AM ETCompany ParticipantsEduardo Haiama -...
content:
Eduardo Haiama - Executive VP of Finance & Investor Relations and Member of Executive Board

 Elio Gil de Meirelles Wolff - Executive VP of Strategy & Business Development and Member of the Executive Board

 Italo Tadeu de Carvalho Freitas Filho - Executive VP of Commercialization, Energy Solutions & Trading and Member of the Executive Board

 Ivan de Souza Monteiro - President, CEO & President of Executive Board

 Juliano de Carvalho Dantas - Executive Vice President of Innovation, R&D, Digital & IT & Member of Executive Board

 Rodrigo Limp Nascimento - Exec. VP of Regulation, Inst. & Market Regulation and Member of the Executive Board

 Robson Pinheiro Rodrigues De Campos - Executive VP of Expansion Engineering & Member of Executive Board

Andre Sampaio - Santander Investment Securities Inc., Research Division

 Bruno Amorim - Goldman Sachs Group, Inc., Research Division

 Daniel Carabolante Travitzky - J. Safra Corretora de Valores e Cambio Ltda, Research Division

 Fillipe Andrade - Itaú Corretora de Valores S.A., Research Division

 João Pimentel - Citigroup Inc., Research Division

Good morning, ladies and gentlemen, and welcome to Eletrobrás' Earnings Call for the second quarter of 2025. We have with us Mr. Ivan de Souza Monteiro, CEO of Eletrobrás; Mr. Eduardo Haiama, VP of Finance and Investor Relations; Mr. Antonio Varejão de Godoy, VP of Operations and Security; Ms. Camila Araujo, VP of Governance, Risk, Compliance and Sustainability; Mr. Élio Wolff, VP of Strategy and Business Development; Mr. Italo Freitas, VP of Trade and Energy Solutions; Mr. Juliano Dantas, VP of Innovation R&D, Digital and IT; Mr. Marcelo de Siqueira Freitas, VP of Legal; Mr. Renato Carreira, VP of People and Services, Mr. Robson Pinheiro De Campos, VP of Expansion Engineering; and Mr. Rodrigo Limp, VP of Regulation, Institutional and markets.
summary: Eletrobrás (EBR) has hosted its Q2 2025 Earnings Call for the second quarter of 2025. The company's executive team includes Eduardo Haiama, Elio Gil de Meirelles Wolff, Italo Tadeu de Carvalho Freitas Filho, Juliano de Car Valvalho Dantas, Executive VP of Innovation, R&D, Digital & IT, and Rodrigo Limp Nascimento. The call will be conducted by Ivan de Souza Monteiro, President, CEO & President of the Executive Board. The financial and operational roles of these executives are also included in the executive team.
shortSummary: Eletrobrás' Q2 earnings report includes key executives like Ivan de Souza Monteiro, Elio Gil de Meirelles Wolff, and Robson Pinheiro De Campos.
argos_summary: Eletrobrás held its Earnings Call for the second quarter of 2025, featuring key executives including CEO Ivan de Souza Monteiro and various Executive VPs overseeing finance, strategy, operations, and innovation. The call included insights from members of the executive board and representatives from several research divisions of major financial institutions.
